registerToIssuanceModule(address).notice: Called by another module to register itself on debt issuance module. Any logic can be included in case checks need to be made or state needs to be updated.

unregisterFromIssuanceModule(address).notice: Called by another module to unregister itself on debt issuance module. Any logic can be included in case checks need to be made or state needs to be cleared.
